	Our client is seeking to hire a creative and data-driven Social Media Executive &amp; Content Creator to manage our online presence, create engaging content, and drive brand awareness and lead generation across digital platforms.
	The ideal candidate will combine storytelling, visual creativity, and social media strategy to showcase properties, promote projects, and attract qualified buyers and investors

	Proven experience creating video content (Reels, TikTok, Shorts).
	Proficiency in content creation and editing tools (Canva, CapCut, Adobe Suite, etc.).
	Strong copywriting and storytelling skills.

title: Job Vacancies at Syntax Technology
content:
Syntax Technology is a Nigerian-based digital solutions company committed to delivering creative, strategic, and tailored digital services. With a team of skilled professionals, we partner with businesses—big or small—to turn their ideas into results.

Whether you're a start-up looking to build your online presence or an established company ready to scale, we offer the digital edge you need.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Hub Operations Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Relationships: Reports to: Hub Operations Sup. & Head, Parcel

Job Summary / Objective
     

            
    




	Ensure customer satisfaction.


Job Duties / Responsibilities or Technical Core Skills
Accountability:
Receiving goods into the warehouse and documenting them accordingly.


	Issuing goods from the warehouse and documenting the process accordingly.
	Seeing the effective arrangement/shelving/stacking/palletizing of goods in the inbound warehouse in an orderly and professional manner.
	Ensuring the security of goods in the warehouse.
	Coordinate and directly supervise the actual loading of waybills into the truck and bus.
	Periodic (DAILY) inventory checks and high-lighting/escalating old/forgotten waybills to the Cargo Head for appropriate action.


Equipment / Technology:


	Software, Personal Computer,
	Nature of Work: Ensure all shipments received in the warehouse are properly accounted for and well documented.
	Report all short-landed waybills within 3 hours of truck unloading.
	Speed in job delivery.
	Return the copy of PODs by email to the hub or Origin.


Application Closing Date: 21st February, 2026. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitmentsyntax@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Account Officer

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are a leading logistics firm seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Account Officer to join our dynamic team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing and overseeing the collection of payments owed to the organization, ensuring that receivables are accurately recorded, and maintaining the financial health of the company


Responsibilities


	Regularly reviewing and updating accounts receivable aging reports to identify overdue payments and prioritize collection efforts.
	Ensuring the accurate receipt of payments from customers through various methods (e.g., checks, bank transfers, online payments).
	Regularly reconciling accounts receivable records with the general ledger to ensure accuracy.
	Assisting in the month-end or year-end closing process by ensuring that all receivable transactions are accounted for.


Relevant work experience/Qualifications


	Minimum of HND / B.Sc / B.Tech in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
	1-3 years of experience in auditing or internal controls, preferably within the logistics industry.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint).
	Must have completed the NYSC Program.
	Strong analytical, communication, and problem-solving skills.
	Detail-oriented with the ability to handle multiple tasks.


Salary
N150,000 / month. 

Application Closing Date: 2nd February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitmentsyntax@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Warehouse Officer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) and Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Oversee the receipt of shipment parcels from hubs, ensuring accuracy and compliance with company standards.
	Assess waybill shipments received and ensure proper documentation and record-keeping.
	Plan and coordinate the dispatch of waybill shipments to their designated destination.
	Supervise and coordinate the loading process at the loading bay to ensure efficiency and safety.
	Update waybill shipment records in the hub to ensure accurate tracking and accountability.
	Allocate waybill shipments appropriately based on destination and urgency.


Requirements


	HND / BSc in any relevant discipline
	Minimum of One (1) years of working experience in logistics industry.
	Must have completed the NYSC Program.
	Strong analytical, communication, and problem-solving skills.
	Detail-oriented with the ability to handle multiple tasks


Salary
N100,000 / month. 

Application Closing Date: 2nd February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume to: recruitmentsyntax@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Job Openings at StrataHR Limited
content:
StrataHR is a talent sourcing consulting, recruiting the best talent for the professional services and technology industry.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) General Counsel

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview
     

            
    




	As General Counsel, you willown all legal matters across the holding company and its portfolio, providing strategic and operational legal guidance.
	You will work closely with founders, executives, and management teams toprotect the company while enabling growth, particularly intech, fintech, and startup ventures.
	This is a high-impact role with opportunities forequity participation in one or more of our client'sportfolio companies.You are astrategic thinker, entrepreneurial, and comfortableadvising at the intersection of law, tech, and business.
	You enjoy working across multiple ventures and are eager togrow with a company that is building Africa’s next-generation innovation ecosystem. You get to hire atleast 3 lawyers to support the legal team and to report to you.


Key Responsibilities


	Provideend-to-end legal advisoryacross the holding company and subsidiaries, including contracts, corporate governance, intellectual property, and regulatory compliance.
	Draft, review, and negotiatecommercial agreements, investment agreements, partnership agreements, SaaS agreements, NDAs, and IP assignments.
	Serve as theprimary legal advisoron corporate matters, includingCAC registrations, share issuances, corporate structure, and compliance.
	Supportfundraising, investments, joint ventures, and acquisitionswithin the portfolio.
	Advisefounders and managementon startup legal risks, employment contracts, equity structures, and regulatory requirements.
	Collaborate with business teams to ensure legal frameworksalign with company strategy and commercial objectives.
	Monitorregulatory and industry trends, ensuring the company and portfolio remain compliant while minimizing risk.
	Build and maintain atrusted relationship with internal and external stakeholders, including lawyers, regulators, and investors.
	Mentor and guidejunior legal staff or outsourced counselas the team grows.


Qualifications & Experience


	Law degree from a recognized university; admission to practice in Nigeria required. A Masters Degree is an added advantage.
	4+ years of post-call experience, ideally with a mix ofcorporate law, commercial contracts, startups, and tech practice.
	Experience instartups, fintech, or technology-focused ventureshighly desirable.
	Proven experience withcontract drafting and negotiation, corporate governance, and CAC compliance.
	Strong understanding ofintellectual property, licensing, and equity arrangements.
	Business-minded, able toalign legal advice with commercial goals.
	Excellent communication andstakeholder management skills.
	Ability towork in a fast-paced, multi-venture environment, managing competing priorities.
	Excellent writing, listening, wrting, presentation and organisational skills.


Benefits


	Salary: N500,000 - N600,000 / month.
	Competitive monthly salary.
	Stock options in portfolio companies(vesting schedule)
	Opportunity toshape the legal and strategic frameworkof a fast-growing investment holding company
	Exposure tomultiple tech and startup ventures
	Collaborative and dynamic work environment.


Application Closing Date: 1st March, 2026.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume and a Cover Letter to: hello@stratahr.ng using "Application for the position of a General Counsel" as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Full Stack Developer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Contract

Description


	Our Client is looking for a talented and forward-thinking Full Stack Software Developerto join our team and help us build the next generation ofLLM-powered web applications.
	This is not an entry-level role.We want an experienced mid-level developer who already understands how to build web applications the traditional wayand is now eager to push boundaries by leveragingLarge Language Models (LLMs) to accelerate development, improve user experience, and create entirely new product capabilities.
	The successful candidate can work remotely but will be required to be in the office atleast once a week.


Key Responsibilities


	Design, develop, and deploy web applications using modern frameworks (e.g., React, Next.js, Django, Node.js, etc.) and Large Language Models e.g., OpenAI, Anthropic, or similar.
	Write clean, maintainable, and scalable code,balancing traditional software engineering with AI-enhanced workflows.
	Stay up to date with the latest advancements in LLMs, AI tooling, and web technologies.


Requirements
The ideal candidate will excel in the following areas:


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree
	Proven experience as afull-stack web developer, ability to build out web applications from start to finish manually but with the aid of Large Language Models.
	Strong understanding ofmodern web development frameworks and APIs.
	Demonstrated ability to build and ship production-grade applications and leveraging third-party APIs
	Familiarity with integrating third-party APIs (payment gateways, auth systems, data services).
	Curiosity and enthusiasm for working withLLM platforms(OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, etc.).
	Strong problem-solving skills, with the ability to innovate and experiment responsibly.
	Experience working directly with LLM APIs (e.g., prompt engineering, fine-tuning, embeddings).
	Exposure to cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP, or Azure).
	Knowledge of DevOps, CI/CD, and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).
	Background in product design or UI/UX.
	Must be able to self-regulate and meet developement deadlines, typically 2-weeks
	Excellent speaking, listening and presentation skills.
	Manage a portfolio of web applications.
	Be a catalyst to deliver a truly disruptive products that are growing rapidly
	Solve unique and first-order problems at massive-scale across web applications
	A working knowlegde of Wordpress is ideal but not mandatory.


Salary
N300,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 21st February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume and a Cover Letter to: hello@stratahr.ng using "Application for Full Stack Developer" as the subject of the mail.

Note: Applicants must include verifiable portfolios and links to such portofolios.

 

 

3.) Content Marketer

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Contract

Description


	We are looking for a skilled Content Marketer to create, manage, and distribute content across our portfolio companies, ensuring their messaging is consistent, engaging, and results-driven.


Role Overview


	As a Content Marketer, you will work directly with our portfolio companies to develop and execute content strategies that enhance their brand presence, drive engagement, and support business objectives.
	You will be responsible for creating high-quality content, scheduling posts across platforms, and monitoring performance metrics to optimize results.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement content strategies for portfolio companies in alignment with their business goals.
	Create engaging content for social media, blogs, newsletters, websites, and other digital platforms.
	Schedule and publish posts across multiple social media channels using content management and scheduling tools.
	Monitor and respond to audience engagement, building a consistent brand voice and community interaction.
	Analyze content performance metrics and provide actionable insights to improve reach, engagement, and conversion.
	Collaborate with portfolio company teams, designers, and external agencies to maintain high-quality content output.
	Stay updated on content marketing trends, social media best practices, and emerging platforms.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree
	2+ years of experience in content marketing, social media management, or digital marketing.
	Strong writing, video editing, and storytelling skills.
	Experience with scheduling tools (e.g., Buffer, Hootsuite, HubSpot, Later, or equivalent).
	Familiarity with SEO, email marketing, and content analytics tools.
	Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
	Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset.


Nice-to-Haves:


	Experience working with startups or multiple companies simultaneously.
	Basic graphic design or video editing skills.
	Knowledge of trends in your portfolio companies’ industries.


What We Offer


	Salary: N200,000 monthly.
	Opportunity to shape the content strategy of multiple innovative companies.
	Exposure to a variety of industries and business models.
	Collaborative, dynamic, and growth-oriented environment.


Application Closing Date: 1st February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume and a Cover Letter to: hello@stratahr.ng using "Application for the position of a Content Marketer" as the subject of the mail.

Note: Applicants must include a portfolio of work.

title: Job Openings at Synergy Structure and Shelters Limited
content:
Synergy Structure and Shelters Limited, a real estate company, is recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Quantity Surveyor

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	Our Real Estate & PropTech company is seeking a detail-oriented, analytical, and results-driven Quantity Surveyor with a minimum of 3 years relevant experience.
	The ideal candidate should be proactive, well-organised, and capable of managing project costs, contracts, and financial controls across construction and development projects


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Prepare cost estimates, budgets, bills of quantities, and tender documents for construction projects.
	Monitor project costs and ensure effective cost control throughout the project lifecycle.
	Evaluate contractor bids, negotiate contracts, and manage variations and claims.
	Conduct feasibility studies, cost planning, and value engineering to optimise project value.
	Prepare interim valuations, progress reports, and final accounts.
	Collaborate with project managers, architects, engineers, and contractors to ensure cost efficiency.
	Ensure compliance with contractual terms, industry standards, and company policies.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications.
	Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience.


Click here to apply online

 

 

2.) Content Creator

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos

Requirements


	B.Sc / HND in Mass Communication, Marketing, or related field
	Minimum of 2–3 years of experience in content creation
	Strong skills in copywriting, storytelling, and content planning
	Ability to create engaging content for Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, and other platforms
	Basic proficiency in graphics and video editing tools (e.g. Canva, CapCut)
	Experience in real estate or PropTech is an advantage.


Click here to apply online

 

3.) Architect

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	The ideal candidate will be responsible for architectural design, project planning, and coordination to ensure functional, aesthetic, and regulatory-compliant developments.

	Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience in architectural design and project execution
